officialTitle: Hemodynamic Effects of Supine Position Versus Left Lateral Tilted Position During Cesarean Delivery: a Randomized Controlled Trial.
inclusionCriteria:
* full term
* singleton pregnant women
* scheduled for elective cesarean delivery
* Must be FEMALE
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
* Must have maximum age of 40 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* Cardiac morbidities
* hypertensive disorders of pregnancy
* peripartum bleeding
* baseline systolic blood pressure (SBP) \< 100 mmHg
* body mass index \> 35
